messages.done: ‚ÑπÔ∏è If you are finished with your response, write "{done}".
messages.enter-amount-of-money: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please enter an amount of money.
messages.enter-content: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You may answer in multiple lines, but please only send the response when you have finished writing. You can also use Markdown formatting.
messages.enter-lots-of-text: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You may answer in multiple lines, but please only send the response when you have finished writing.
messages.enter-password: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You should enter a password here, and it's best to delete your response after sending it so the password doesn't remain in the history.
messages.enter-text: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please keep it brief and try to answer in one sentence.
messages.multiple-addresses-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You can enter one or more addresses.
messages.multiple-emails-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You can enter one or more emails.
messages.multiple-numbers-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please enter one or more numbers.
messages.multiple-selections-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please make your selection by typing the number choices. Multiple selections are allowed, please send a separate message for each of your selection.
messages.multiple-values-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You can enter multiple values by sending each value separately.
messages.only-one-selection-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Please make your selection by typing the number of your choice or pressing the button of your choice. Only one selection is allowed.
messages.only-one-value-allowed: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You can only enter one value.

messages.callout-start-response: ‚ùì Would you like to respond to the callout?
